resources.string: THERE ARE NO STATS FOR PRACTICE MODE!

VIPER! A GAME WHERE YOU SLITHER AROUND DODGING YOURSELF AND THE BORDERS, TO EAT APPLES, GET BIGGER AND EARN THE HIGHEST SCORE!

SWIPE ACROSS THE SCREEN IN EACH DIRECTION TO TURN VIPER IN THAT DIRECTION. OF COURSE YOU CANNOT SWIPE AND TURN IN THE OPPOSITE DIRECTION.

WATCH OUT! HIT YOURSELF OR HIT THE WALLS, AND YOU DIE!

YOUR MAIN GOAL IS TO EAT APPLES. EATING EACH APPLE, YOU GET LONGER AND LONGER.

THERE ARE 4 DIFFERENT TYPES OF APPLES, EACH WORTH DIFFERENT POINT VALUES:

RED APPLES: 10 POINTS

SILVER APPLES: 20 POINTS

GOLDEN APPLES: 30 POINTS

MYSTICAL PURPLE APPLES: 50 POINTS

THE MORE POINTS THE APPLE IS, THE RARER IT IS!

DONT TAKE TOO LONG TO GET YOUR APPLE, BECAUSE THEY DISAPPEAR AFTER SOME TIME! RARER THE APPLE, FASTER IT GOES.

HIT THE PAUSE/PLAY BUTTON ON THE TOP TO PAUSE/RESUME YOUR GAME.

IF YOU EVER WANT TO END THE GAME INSTANTLY, CLICK THE CROSS ON THE TOP RIGHT OF THE GAME SCREEN.

HITTING THE GAME MODE BUTTON BELOW THE PLAY BUTTON ALLOWS YOU TO CHANGE GAME MODE.

THERE ARE 5 GAME MODES:

CLASSIC: NORMAL VIPER, WHERE IF YOU HIT THE WALLS OR YOURSELF, YOU PERISH.

NO WALLS: WALLS ARE NOW NOT DANGEROUS. GOING INTO ONE WALL TAKES YOU TO THE OTHER SIDE.

3 X FOOD: NORMAL, EXCEPT 3 APPLES SPAWN AT A TIME.

5 X FOOD: NORMAL, EXCEPT 5 APPLES SPAWN AT A TIME.

PRACTICE: ONLY EXISTS FOR PRACTICE, NO DYING! CLICK THE CROSS TO EXIT.

ON THE BOTTOM BAR THERE ARE 4 BUTTONS

ON THE LEFT, THERE IS THE STATS BUTTON. CLICK IT TO OPEN YOUR STATS.

TO THE RIGHT OF THAT, THE STAR! IF YOU ENJOY THE APP CONSIDER LEAVING A RATING. ITS FREE!

TO THE RIGHT OF THAT, THE SKINS! CLICKING IT OPENS A DIALOG TO CHANGE VIPERS COLOR.

AT THE FAR RIGHT, THE SETTINGS BUTTON. OPENING THE SETTINGS DIALOG ALLOWS YOU TO CHANGE VOLUME, LANGUAGE, AND OPEN THESE INSTRUCTIONS.

THATS ALL FOR THE INSTRUCTIONS. HAVE FUN!
